content.rendered:
The following information is for the nearest hospital and local urgent care facilities that take the University of La Verne’s SHIP insurance. Please have your insurance card on your phone or printed prior to going to any of these locations. You can find your card by clicking here and following the prompts. If you go another location they may be out of the network.

Costs can be found under the link “Insurance Fast Facts” on the left of the page.

Pomona Valley Urgent Care, La Verne

Walk-in facility, NO APPOINTMENT NEEDED
2333 Foothill Blvd. (Ste. C) La Verne CA, 91750
Phone Number: 909-392-6511

La Verne Urgent Care

Walk-in facility, NO APPOINTMENT NEEDED
1234 Foothill Blvd. La Verne CA 91750
Phone Number: 909-971-4808

Pomona Valley Medical Center Emergency Room

Walk-in facility, NO APPOINTMENT NEEDED
1798 N Garey Ave. Pomona CA 91767
Phone Number: 909-564-9500
